titles.title: Volunteer Firefighter/Emergency Medical Service Gas Price Relief Act of 2009
Volunteer Firefighter/Emergency Medical Service Gas Price Relief Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for certain travel expenses of qualified emergency volunteers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care
Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: Volunteer Firefighter/Emergency Medical Service Gas Price Relief Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow volunteers who provide firefighting or emergency medical services a tax deduction for up to $250 of their travel expenses, whether or not such taxpayer itemizes.
